text: Definitely not dating! Ryan Phillippe wants everyone to know he is not in a relationship with Katy Perry. Despite reports the pair had been “ totally flirting ” at Elton John ’ s 70th - birthday party in March, the actor firmly denied it with a frustrated message on Sunday, April 9. “ I AM NOT DATING KATY PERRY, ” he wrote in block capitals on Twitter. “ BARELY KNOW HER. PLEASE STOP FLYING HELICOPTERS OVER MY HOUSE. SHE IS NOT HERE. thx. ” I AM NOT DATING KATY PERRY. BARELY KNOW HER. PLEASE STOP FL
